about_the_game:
• Plan Your Day
    Check your trusty calendar to see what game releases are dropping today and prepare accordingly. A well-run shop starts with a solid plan!

  • Buy Games and Hardware
    Every morning, The Merchant arrives in a van with new licenses. Use your computer to order the hottest games and must-have hardware for the day.

  • Stock the Shelves
    Fill your store with the latest game releases, top-rated peripherals, and everything your customers crave!

  • Run the Register
    Open your shop, scan items, and make that sweet, sweet profit. Just don’t keep customers waiting!

  • Defend Your Store
    Not everyone comes to shop—some have other ideas. Stop troublemakers before they walk away with your stock!

  • Expand and Grow
    Bigger store, more shelves, more customers—grow your empire and become the go-to gaming destination!

    Check your trusty calendar to see what game releases are dropping today and prepare accordingly. A well-run shop starts with a solid plan!

    Every morning, The Merchant arrives in a van with new licenses. Use your computer to order the hottest games and must-have hardware for the day.

    Not everyone comes to shop—some have other ideas. Stop troublemakers before they walk away with your stock!

  • Expand and Grow
    Bigger store, more shelves, more customers—grow your empire and become the go-to gaming destination!
name: GameStonk Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Manage the last videogame store left in town. Do you have what it takes to be the game retail tycoon? Order games, stock up on consoles, roll for discounts and bonuses, strategize upgrades, and hunt thieves.
